titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/11/2011--Passed House without amendment. Elects a specified named Member to the following House Committees: (1) Financial Services, and (2) Transportation and Infrastructure.
